item.title: @@TheAthletic: Saquon Barkley carried the ball more times this ye...
item.description:
Saquon Barkley carried the ball more times this year (436, including the playoffs) than any running back this century, with one exception: 2014 DeMarco Murray.
That name — and that workload — should scare the hell out of you.
